attributes.action: ban the romantic comedy Love Actually from sale in the UK and prevent the DVD release of Valentines day
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Romantic Comedy's give out the wrong message and are detrimental to the welfare of the UK.

They depress people costing the tax payer millions of pounds in prescription medicine and therapy for those affected.

A lot of the characters don't work thus giving out the impression that you can live in a million pound mews house without income and be happy and in love. This of course has a negative impacts on our economy. 

The film also makes a mockery of No.10 staff and the Prime Minister...how rude and inappropriate.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
